name: chabs1i

stmt.origin: mp2an(wceq(co(c0, chj, cin(c0, c1)), c0), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch))
stmt.pretty: mp2an((c0[vH](c0 ⋂ c1))= c0, c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH)

body.origin:
|- wceq(co(c0, chj, cin(c0, c1)), c0)
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wcel(c1, cch)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wceq(co(c0, chj, cin(c0, c1)), c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(co(c0, chj, cin(c0, c1)), c0)
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wcel(c1, cch)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wceq(co(c0, chj, cin(c0, c1)), c0))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wceq(co(c0, chj, cin(c0, c1)), c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(co(c0, chj, cin(c0, c1)), c0)
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wcel(c1, cch)

comment: Hilbert lattice absorption law. From definition of lattice in [Kalmbach] p. 14. (Contributed by NM, 10-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
